Key Arguments: The proposed legislation is seen as a means of controlling thoughts and speech.
There is concern about the potential abuse of power by the ACMA.
The legislation could have a chilling effect on free speech, as noted by companies like Meta.
The government could misuse the law to label inconvenient truths as misinformation.
The importance of debate and free flow of information in discerning truth is emphasized.
Notable Quotes: This proposed Bill seems to be one of control of thoughts and speech over anyone with a different view of life.
Giving the government such unrestricted power is terrifying.
Censoring debate stops this vital process.
